players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Day 1 begins.

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Alice was found dead.
You investigated Diana and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Beware, Diana knows you're the detective.
Day 1 begins.
You: "I investigated Diana last night — she is the mafia. We need to arrest Diana today."
Charlie: "Diana, respond to Bob’s claim. Bob, why out yourself D1 as detective? If you’re legit, who killed Alice instead of targeting you?"
Diana: "Charlie, this makes no sense: if Bob is really detective, why would mafia kill Alice instead of the claimed PR? This feels like a reckless fake-claim to force a D1 mis-arrest."
You: "Because there’s only one mafioso, Diana couldn’t kill me after I hard-claimed—night kill happened before I revealed. I got Diana as mafia last night. Charlie, vote Diana and we win today."
Charlie: remained silent.

Diana: "D1 fake-claims are common. Bob’s story fits perfect info after the fact. If he’s real, he just suicided us into LYLO tomorrow. Let’s no-arrest today, force him to live, and reevaluate his claim."
Votes: Bob voted for Diana, Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Charlie
Diana was arrested

players.name: Diana
memory: You're Diana, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Alice.
The villager Alice was found dead.
Beware, Bob is the detective and discovered you're the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
Bob: "I investigated Diana last night — she is the mafia. We need to arrest Diana today."
Charlie: "Diana, respond to Bob’s claim. Bob, why out yourself D1 as detective? If you’re legit, who killed Alice instead of targeting you?"
You: "Charlie, this makes no sense: if Bob is really detective, why would mafia kill Alice instead of the claimed PR? This feels like a reckless fake-claim to force a D1 mis-arrest."
Bob: "Because there’s only one mafioso, Diana couldn’t kill me after I hard-claimed—night kill happened before I revealed. I got Diana as mafia last night. Charlie, vote Diana and we win today."
Charlie: remained silent.

You: "D1 fake-claims are common. Bob’s story fits perfect info after the fact. If he’s real, he just suicided us into LYLO tomorrow. Let’s no-arrest today, force him to live, and reevaluate his claim."
